item.title: 据一家全球通讯社报道，在一张威尔士王妃凯特和她的孩子们的照片因编辑问题被撤回后，肯辛顿宫不再被视为可信的消息来源。
item.description:
Kensington Palace is no longer considered a trusted source, according to one global news agency, after a photo of Kate, the Princess of Wales, and her children was retracted due to editing concerns. https://t.co/wfer47Cdi4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据匹兹堡企鹅队称，一批原定于周四晚在匹兹堡企鹅队比赛中分发的贾罗米尔-贾格尔公仔被盗。
item.description:
A shipment of Jaromir Jagr bobbleheads that were to be distributed at a Pittsburgh Penguins game Thursday night have been stolen, the team said. https://t.co/Nw51JSE77i

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 田纳西州酒精饮料委员会表示，它正在调查失踪大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）在纳什维尔夜游失踪前是否被超量饮酒。
item.description:
The Tennessee Alcoholic Beverage Commission said it is investigating whether missing college student Riley Strain was overserved before he vanished during a night out in Nashville. https://t.co/VjlofQ6eA5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 市场报告显示，美国经济的就业人数强劲，通货膨胀率也在下降，但一些小企业主告诉 @ABC News，他们仍然感觉到了压力。
item.description:
Market reports show the U.S. economy is seeing strong job numbers and a waning inflation rate — but some small business owners tell @ABC News they are still feeling the pinch. https://t.co/gFCcAwv3TI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 新消息：众议院司法委员会主席吉姆-乔丹（Jim Jordan）威胁富尔顿县地方检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）说，如果威利斯不遵从国会传票的要求，他将藐视国会，该传票是委员会调查富尔顿县地方检察官办公室的一部分。
item.description:
NEW: House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan has threatened Fulton County DA Fani Willis with contempt of congress if Willis does not comply with a congressional subpoena as part of the committee's investigation into the Fulton County DA's office. https://t.co/mqYMPPQNqp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）周四表示，他向共和党会议传达的信息是 "团结一致 "和 "完成任务"，以扩大众议院的多数席位--这是该党派在大选年的首要任务，因为在今年，该党派在众议院的多数席位非常稀少。
item.description:
House Speaker Mike Johnson said Thursday that his message to the GOP conference is to "stick together" and "get the job done" to expand the House majority — a priority in an election year where the party has a razor-thin House majority. https://t.co/3L4RQbh0WH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 参议院多数党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）周四发表了严厉的讲话，呼吁以色列重新举行选举。

item.title: 新泽西州的参议员竞选为选民提供了一个选择：一位国会议员、一位第一夫人，还有可能是一位因腐败指控而被起诉但却矢口否认的现任参议员。
item.description:
New Jersey's Senate race is offering voters a choice between a congressman, a first lady, and, possibly, a sitting senator indicted on corruption charges that he denies. https://t.co/Tdi0pIotAJ

Kansas City Chiefs stars Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce are taking their talents from the stadium to the steakhouse, investing as partners in a new Kansas City restaurant. https://t.co/bE3v0uG8xb

item.title: 在竞争对手乔-拜登（Joe Biden）抓住本周早些时候特朗普提出可能削减社保的言论不放之后，美国前总统特朗普在一次新的采访中试图明确表示，他 "绝不会做任何危害或损害社保或医疗保险的事情"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump sought to make clear in a new interview that he will "never do anything that will jeopardize or hurt Social Security or Medicare" after rival Joe Biden seized on comments earlier this week in which Trump floated potential cuts. https://t.co/ztPp7xwA5f

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 埃博拉疫情在西非造成一万多人死亡，加剧了该地区的经济和政治问题，利比里亚人本周聚集在一起，纪念该国遭受埃博拉疫情袭击十年。
item.description:
Liberians gathered this week to mark a decade since the country was hit by a devastating Ebola outbreak that killed more than 10,000 people in West Africa, adding to the region’s economic and political troubles. https://t.co/Fyy0rLxYkG

item.title: 参议院多数党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）周四呼吁以色列举行新的选举，他认为以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）已经 "迷失方向"，是该地区和平的障碍。
item.description:
Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer on Thursday called on Israel to hold new elections, saying he believes Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu has "lost his way" and is an obstacle to peace in the region. https://t.co/hIsG5AjO3j

item.title: 拜登政府官员周四宣布，拜登政府将向部落政府拨款 1.2 亿多美元，用于应对气候变化的影响。

item.title: 莫桑比克官员说，热带风暴 "菲利波 "登陆莫桑比克，已造成至少两人死亡，数千人流离失所。

item.title: 最新消息：美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）周四表示，其 "星际飞船"（Starship）火箭在印度洋上空重返大气层时失去了联系，但第三次试飞仍然被认为是成功的，因为它比之前的任何一次试飞都更进一步。
item.description:
BREAKING: SpaceX lost contact with its Starship rocket on reentry over the Indian Ocean, the company said Thursday, but the third test flight was still deemed a success as it advanced further than either previous test. https://t.co/5bvSydVXvM pic.twitter.com/7SqEoqWp8i

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 在日本东武动物园，动物园管理员要装扮成老虎，然后被同事抓住：
item.description:
Ever wondered how a zoo prepares for the prospect of a tiger escaping due to the impact of a major earthquake?

At Japan's Tobu Zoo, it involves a zookeeper dressing up as the animal and getting captured by coworkers.

Watch: https://t.co/RsvkUIblof pic.twitter.com/n9MwORd3Nw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 最新消息参议员查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）说，两国解决方案是以色列和巴勒斯坦 "唯一现实且可持续的解决方案"，并补充说，包括哈马斯和以色列总理内塔尼亚胡在内的 "四大障碍 "是两国解决方案的 "拦路虎"。
item.description:
JUST IN: Sen. Chuck Schumer says a two-state solution is the "only realistic and sustainable solution" with Israel and Palestine, adding that "four major obstacles," including Hamas and Israeli PM Netanyahu, are "in the way" of a two-state solution. https://t.co/8QRM5l183i pic.twitter.com/TBicZYH7mi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 上周申请失业救济金的美国人数略有上升，但基本维持在历史较低水平，因为尽管利率升高，劳动力市场仍在继续蓬勃发展。
item.description:
The number of Americans applying for jobless benefits last week inched up but largely stayed at historically low levels as the labor market continues to thrive despite elevated interest rates. https://t.co/FiIctkq9dF

item.title: 新消息：美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的巨型火箭周四再次试飞，这次的目标是绕地球半圈。
item.description:
NEW: SpaceX’s mega rocket blasted off on another test flight Thursday, aiming to make it halfway around the world this time.

The first two flights last year lasted mere minutes before blowing up over the Gulf of Mexico. https://t.co/ZXD0by4mPX

item.title: "你让我的人生少活了 50 年。"卡米拉王后获赠了她自己的仿真芭比娃娃，以庆祝她担任世界妇女基金会主席以及该基金会在增强女童和妇女权能方面所做的工作。
item.description:
"You've taken about 50 years off my life."

Queen Camilla was presented with her very own lookalike Barbie doll to celebrate her role as president of the Women of the World Foundation and its work in empowering girls and women. https://t.co/qtVQheqA89 pic.twitter.com/lFVNeASp0N

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 一名建筑工人在挖掘停车场时，发现了一座拥有 1800 年历史的神秘罗马雕像。
